Reviews.Title: Metal outer ring, comes dusty though
Reviews.Author: jlloyd50
Reviews.Content: The build on these is good, metal outer ring threaded onto the lens with groves to hold on the outer lens cap. Fits great with my Sony NEX-3N. Unfortunately, it comes covered in dust which must be removed before installing, which is not a big deal but could have ruined a few pictures if I didn’t notice.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: Thomas N. Gilmore
Reviews.Content: This filter fit my Sony NEX camera perfectly. Good quality and happy with the purchase and fast shipment. I needed this to protect my lens and also for UV ray protection.

Reviews.Title: A must buy!
Reviews.Author: kevandliz
Reviews.Content: I like to keep my reviews short and sweet. You simply want to know if this product is made of good quality and will work on your device.Short answer is yes!Perfect for any 40.5mm lens, not just the Sony NEX-3N. I've used it with the 16-50PZ Lens for my NEX-6 as well and couldn't be happier. Excellent build quality.
